wardance.tooltip.parry: Parries up to %s times per %.2d seconds
wardance.tooltip.attack: Ambushes distracted targets for %s damage and unaware targets for %s damage
wardance.quickSkill: Cast Last Used Skill (Combat Mode only)

wardance:heavy_blow.desc:
The next attack in 2 seconds launches a vicious strike, guaranteeing a crit if it lands. If the target parries the blow, their parrying hand will be disabled for 1.5 seconds. Recharges after 3 attacks.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the target has Iron Guard active.
wardance:backstab.desc: Automatically cast heavy blow for free when attacking an unaware target, if it is not in cooldown.
wardance:poise.desc: Parries become free until this skill expires or an attack is launched.
wardance:stagger.desc: Adds up to 1.3 seconds of slowness and 5 posture damage depending on how slow your weapon is.
wardance:vault.desc: +2 range for the attack and dash backwards slightly.
wardance:shatter.desc: Bind time and crit damage multiplier increases by 20% for every different skill casted by your last five successful casts
wardance:iron_guard.desc:
Brace yourself for impact, causing the next parry in 1.5 seconds to reflect all posture damage back onto the attacker. If the attack was ranged, the projectile reflected back at its shooter with full force. Recharge after 5 parries.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the melee attacker had Heavy Blow active.
wardance:backpedal.desc: Instead of reflecting posture damage, all posture damage taken is converted to knockback.
wardance:bind.desc: The attacker's attacking hand will be bound for 2 seconds on parry.
wardance:overpower.desc: Additionally consume posture from the attacker as if attacking with the parrying weapon.
wardance:recovery.desc: Your posture and spirit cooldowns are reset, and your might and combo grace period are refilled, upon parry.
wardance:coup_de_grace.desc: When toggled, all damage dealt to targets with less than 20% health (including wounding) will be converted to posture. An attack on a staggered target under 20% will instantly kill and give 1 might. Cast when active to end this skill. Recharge after 2 skill casts.
wardance:reinvigorate.desc: Kills will additionally restore health, posture, and spirit by an amount equal to 10% of the target's life, and heal wounding, fatigue, and burnout by an equivalent amount.
wardance:reaping.desc: Activate to gain omnidirectional sweep. This attack cannot be parried, targets below ((5% of max health)+(weapon damage)*2) will take true damage, and this skill instantly refreshes if a target dies in this manner. Cooldown +3.
wardance:frenzy.desc: All physical skills instantly cool down on a kill.
wardance:danse_macabre.desc: The percentage at which an entity is eligible for execution scales with your combo, up to 40%.
wardance:rupture.desc: Absorb half the target's spirit and cause the other half to violently escape in a large explosion. The size of the explosion is the square root of the target's max posture, and it deals up to (spirit) explosion damage to non-allies caught in the blast radius.
wardance:kick.desc: The next attack in 2 seconds only has a range of 2 blocks, but deals 6 unblockable posture damage and 1 point of falling block damage. Recharge after 5 attacks.
wardance:iron_knee.desc: All knockback from the attack is converted into additional posture damage
wardance:tackle.desc: +2 range on kick and dashes forward
wardance:backflip.desc: Use the reaction force from the kick to leap back and recover 30% lost posture.
wardance:low_sweep.desc: Kicks sweep a 60 degree area in front of you.
wardance:trip.desc: Usable only when both you and your target are grounded. Reduce target posture regeneration by 60% for an amount of time equal to double its posture cooldown. Cooldown -1.
wardance:grapple.desc: Landing two unarmed strikes on the same target in 3 seconds after casting this skill will grab and throw them to the ground for 10 posture damage. Recharge after 7 attacks.
wardance:clinch.desc: The hand performing the first unarmed strike will bind the same hand on the target. If both hands are empty, both of the target's hands will be simultaneously bound.
wardance:suplex.desc: Grab the target and brutally slam them behind you, dealing double of your current posture as true posture damage to the target, but also consuming almost all of your own posture.
wardance:submission.desc: Grapple triggers on first strike and has its cooldown reduced by 2 if you have more armor than your target.
wardance:reversal.desc: A successful grapple instead swaps the posture of the attacker and target by percentage.
wardance:shield_bash.desc: In the next 2 seconds, your shield will behave as a range 2 blunt weapon once, dealing additional posture damage equivalent to its shield time. Recharge in 4 parries.
wardance:rim_punch.desc: Smash the shield's rim into the target, gaining +1 range for the attack and nauseating them for 2 seconds.
wardance:foot_slam.desc: Slam the shield into the enemy's foot, slowing and distracting them for 3 seconds.
wardance:overbear.desc: Put all your weight into the attack, dealing extra damage equal to double your shield time and doubling posture damage. If this does not stagger the target, slows you for 2.5 seconds.
wardance:berserk.desc: Upon cast and successful attack with shield, recharge both hands and increase your attack speed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
wardance:arm_lock.desc: Parrying with this skill active will bind the attacker's attacking hand for 1.5 seconds. Cooldown +1.
wardance:fighting_spirit.desc: All of this skill's variations have a passive that will function until the skill enters cooldown. When cast at full posture, no might, and full spirit, this skill will simulate a full night's sleep after five seconds of not taking damage, during which time you are immobile; otherwise, you gain a series of buffs. The base form grants regeneration and absorption for 10 seconds. Recharge after 5 minutes or sleeping in a bed.
wardance:boulder_brace.desc:
§lPassive:§r halved posture cooldown time. 
§l Active:§r restore all posture; for 10 seconds, regenerate 1 posture per second regardless of cooldown.
wardance:wind_scar.desc:
§lPassive:§r +1 block reach. 
§l Active:§r gain omnidirectional sweeping for 10 seconds.
wardance:flame_dance.desc:
§lPassive:§r attack speed increases by 0.1 for every level of combo. 
§l Active:§r for 20 seconds, every third hit will crit for an additional 1.5x damage and cause your next parry to be free.
wardance:frost_fang.desc:
§lPassive:§r +2 luck. 
§l Active:§r for 20 seconds, gain 40% speed and slow enemies for 3 seconds on hit; if they are alert, they are additionally blinded for 1 second.
wardance:timberfall.desc:
§lPassive:§r 5x the might generated is added to posture damage on attack. 
§l Active:§r guarantee crit and +40% dealt melee damage for 10 seconds.
wardance:feint.desc: The next attack in 2.5 seconds tricks the opponent into guarding against it. If it is parried, both hands of the target will be reset; if it is not parried, all damage dealt is converted into posture damage. This cannot stagger the target. Recharge in 3 attacks.
wardance:last_surprise.desc: The target is distracted for 3 seconds.
wardance:smirking_shadow.desc: Teleport 2 blocks behind the target after the attack.
wardance:scorpion_sting.desc: This attack will trigger effects that apply on damage if it is not parried.
wardance:upper_hand.desc: Recover an equivalent amount of posture.
wardance:crown_champion.desc: Gain 5% extra attack damage per level of might.
wardance:vengeful_might.desc: Gain 10% of damage received as might and highlight your attacker for 5 seconds.
wardance:hidden_might.desc: Gain 1 might from an unaware stab. The distance at which you are detected is reduced by 30%; for every level of might you gain, 3% of this detection is converted to speed.
wardance:prideful_might.desc: Might gain is tripled, but all might is lost when taking damage. After gaining 3 levels of might, your shatter will instantly cool down.
wardance:elemental_might.desc: Attacking a target causes it to take 1 more damage from non-physical sources for the next 5 seconds; gain 1 might when an entity in 5 blocks dies from non-physical damage.
wardance:execution.desc:
Costs 8 might to activate. Converts all dealt melee damage to posture, and takes one life's worth of health from the target on stagger, ending their stagger instantly.
Monsters have an amount of lives equal to the natural logarithm of their max health minus one, and players always have three.
wardance:crowd_pleaser.desc: After taking a life, allies within 10 blocks gain extra attack power and speed, with duration shortening based on the number of allies.
wardance:flare.desc: Take two lives, then cause the target to rapidly regenerate 1.4 lives.
wardance:masters_lesson.desc: While active, all generated might will be converted into free parries at a 1:1 ratio.
